org.activebpel.rt.util
Class AeSequenceReader

java.lang.Object
  java.io.Reader
      org.activebpel.rt.util.AeSequenceReader
public class AeSequenceReader
extends java.io.Reader

Joins two readers together much like java.io.SequenceInputStream
